title: Memet-Hiemal
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=
My darling, since you've left, it feels like I've been living life on repeat.
]]
=====

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-trans-pride |trans-pride-logo= --]]]

[[module css]]
.footnotes-footer {
display:none;
}
[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

@@
@@
@@
@@
@@
@@

...I look from the ground and to the sky
And think what thoughts I have to try
Something stillborn, something still new
It was not for you, it was not true

[[div class="indented"]]

I walk down past the cemt'ry gates
And glance the dark spot where I wait
To stand below the shifting leaves
Leave me be, will you please?

We watched it drop from the white
Then vanish into mildew light

You saw from the left how it ends
While I turned right around the bend
Neither of us could comprehend --

We had not explored the red.

Alone I straighten up my gait
I walk past the tree from where I wait
And toward the darkest side beside
The former text it occupied

The ground is still left agape
The fresh threshold is still in shape

[[/div]]

Much to my dismay
I look down to speak its name
The epitaph I wrote
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/starfish-crossed-lovers yesterday...]

Dedicated to SCPs 6848 and 6849, which were posted anonymously by [[*user The Community]] yesterday. They were short, but I thought they were kind of cute. ~[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beneath-the-floorboards Shuck & Roxy]
